_header: Alas alas and alas why / hath fortune done so cruelly

CULFf16.First Lines:
Alas alas and Alas whyhath fortune done so crewellyffro me to
                    take awey þe seyteOf þat þat gewit my hert
                    lyte…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Wyt oute faynyng of my hertThow I fele neuer soo grete
                    smert
CULFf16.Facsimiles:
Beadle,  Richard,  and  Alfred E. B. Owen.  
             The Findern Manuscript: Cambridge University Library MS. F.1.6.
         London: Scolar Press, 1977.

Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 31.
